notes.content:
Key Integration Endpoints:

OData API:
https://api.successfactors.com/odata/v2/

BizX API:
https://api.successfactors.com/bizx/

SFAPI (SOAP):
https://api.successfactors.com/sfapi/v1/soap

Authentication:
- OAuth 2.0 recommended
- Basic Auth supported (legacy)
- X.509 certificates for SSO

Rate Limits:
- Standard: 20,000 calls/hour
- Burst: 100 calls/minute
notes.title: API Integration Reference

notes.content:
Pre-Sales Demo Script:

1. Recruiting (20 min)
- Show job requisition creation
- Candidate experience portal
- Interview scheduling
- Offer management

2. Onboarding (15 min)
- New hire portal
- E-signature workflows
- Equipment provisioning
- First day checklist

3. Performance & Goals (15 min)
- Goal cascade
- Continuous feedback
- Performance review
- 360 feedback

4. Learning (10 min)
- Learning catalog
- Assignments & compliance
- Mobile learning

Demo Credentials:
Username: demo@sap.com
Password: Demo2024!

Demo URL:
https://demo.successfactors.com
notes.title: Pre-Sales Demo Runbook

notes.content:
SuccessFactors vs Workday - Key Differentiators:

1. INTEGRATION
- Workday: Fragmented after 14+ acquisitions
- SAP: Seamless BTP integration, lower TCO

2. AI CAPABILITIES  
- Workday: Illuminate AI (early stage)
- SAP: Joule AI production-ready across HCM, S/4HANA

3. PARTNER ECOSYSTEM
- Workday: Limited 3rd-party integrations
- SAP: 500+ partners, 300+ apps

4. GLOBAL REACH
- Workday: Payroll in handful of countries
- SAP: 50+ countries, 100+ localizations

5. ERP COMPLETENESS
- Workday: HCM-only
- SAP: Complete ERP suite

Positioning: SAP = mature, integrated, flexible
notes.title: Competitive Talking Points - Workday

notes.content:
Common Support Issues & Solutions:

1. SSO Configuration Issues
- Verify SAML metadata is current
- Check certificate expiration
- Validate attribute mappings

2. Integration Failures
- Check API credentials
- Verify IP whitelist
- Review error logs in Provisioning

3. Performance Issues
- Clear browser cache
- Check scheduled jobs
- Review custom MDF objects

4. Permission Problems
- Verify role-based permissions
- Check position-based permissions
- Review target population settings

5. Data Loading Errors
- Validate CSV format
- Check field mappings
- Review import log details

Support Portal:
https://launchpad.support.sap.com
notes.title: Common Issues & Troubleshooting

notes.content:
Implementation Checklist:

Phase 1: Discovery (2-4 weeks)
☐ Stakeholder interviews
☐ Current state analysis
☐ Requirements gathering
☐ Solution design workshops

Phase 2: Configuration (6-8 weeks)
☐ Instance provisioning
☐ Security & permissions setup
☐ Core modules configuration
☐ Integration development
☐ Data migration planning

Phase 3: Testing (3-4 weeks)
☐ Unit testing
☐ Integration testing
☐ User acceptance testing
☐ Performance testing

Phase 4: Deployment (2-3 weeks)
☐ Production data migration
☐ Go-live support
☐ Hypercare period
☐ Post-deployment review

Key Success Factors:
✓ Executive sponsorship
✓ Change management
✓ User training program
✓ Regular communication
notes.title: Implementation Project Checklist
